site_title: 30 Units PHiZZ Ball by Thomas Hull

block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: I saw this Kusudama and really wanted to make one. This is the 30 Units PHiZZ Ball designed by Thomas Hull. It's a modular origami model that looks like a combination of the Penultimate dodecahedron by Robert Neal and the 30 Unit Sonobe Icosahedron. Learn how to fold the module and assemble it in this video. Less than a minute origami. As usual, Enjoy!!! A side note for future reference. PHiZZ is an accronyme for Pentagon-Hexagon Zig-Zag. The unit is called the Pentagon-Hexagon Zig-Zag unit or PHiZZ Unit for short. Thanks for watching! Wilson Lee@Heap Art

block_list.title: More Designs from Thomas Hull
